snippet: The agent Scott Boras, whose clients include Jacoby Ellsbury, Shin-Soo Choo and Stephen Drew, has made a point in recent years to tweak the Mets, and did so again Wednesday.
abstract: Scott Boras, agent for some of baseball's stars, gives his annual, unofficial address at baseball's general manager's meeting, making number of quips at the expense of the New York Mets; discusses free agent clients Jacoby Ellsbury, Shin-Soo Choo and Stephen Drew, all possible fits for the New York Yankees or Mets.
lead_paragraph: The agent Scott Boras, whose clients include Jacoby Ellsbury, Shin-Soo Choo and Stephen Drew, has made a point in recent years to tweak the Mets, and did so again Wednesday.

headline.main: Boras Has a Few Zingers, and a Few Free-Agent Stars, for the Mets
headline.print_headline: Boras Has a Few Zingers, and a Few Free-Agent Stars, for the Mets
